message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to the table.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I agree the product is great, the price is a bit high for me. Would you consider $6,000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $8,500. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
